name: Dung3on-date
description:
rc2 has a bug fix

you are a knight sent to a dungeon to clear out a local cult 

when  you come across them summoning a snake demon .when you lay eyes on her you know your quest is to romance her while simultaneously defat all of the cultist

we used the 128x128 the lager one is just to have a better look at the artwork

art by me https://www.instagram.com/kindly_alligator/

code and levels by https://twitter.com/MoltakDev

music and sounds by https://soundcloud.com/scott-oldroyd and https://soundcloud.com/sebastian_whyte
